SEARCH
Module com.javarepowizards.portfoliomanager
Package com.javarepowizards.portfoliomanager.dao

Class InMemoryPortfolioDAO

java.lang.Object
com.javarepowizards.portfoliomanager.dao.InMemoryPortfolioDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPortfolioDAO
@Repository public class InMemoryPortfolioDAO extends Object implements IPortfolioDAO
In-memory implementation of the portfolio data access object. Stores portfolio entries and available balance in memory. Initializes with a default set of holdings as of a fixed date.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    InMemoryPortfolioDAO()
    Constructs the in-memory portfolio DAO and populates initial holdings.

  • Constructor Details

    • InMemoryPortfolioDAO

      public InMemoryPortfolioDAO()
      Constructs the in-memory portfolio DAO and populates initial holdings. Uses a fixed date to fetch sample stock data for initial entries.

    • getTotalPortfolioValue

      public double getTotalPortfolioValue()
      Computes the total value of the portfolio. Includes the available cash balance plus the market value of all holdings.
      Specified by:
